post.body: thanks but I can't take credit. I swooped it from some stila site or something... I love the old stila girls.
Right! The 1 wk I give her is to realize what she's done.If she doesn't, that's not the kind of person I will associate with.
I'm glad for you. How long did it take you to realize it was toxic?
I agree. Purging is also good way to prepare for 2009, with a clean slate.
Hi! I've been working on emailing you back.It was VERY helpful. I think this 'breakup' will be easy, I think, just unexpected.
sign into yahoo messenger if you're still up.
Hi Ink. Was thinking about you today. =)
nah, its too pathetic to be a sandwich. I don't have cheese and its too cold to go outside for anything. Brr...
lip numbness? But u turned down the sausage...
:) ditto
lol
Don't hate, girl, don't hate on the pickled sausage
interesting. Any ones in particular? (Drugstore mascaras)
:) I couldn't resist picking up san francisco either. I'll have to check out black on black next trip. Thanks for the rec!
so true. There were so many colors to choose from, it was hard to pick. Even a lot of blues and greens...
Thanks! :)
Kismet Elated. I never knew about these polishes until Walgreens just had a bogo on it, which made it $1 each! Love them!
It does look cheapo, doesn't it? I think I got it from some asian grocery store.
me too... And I totally was expecting it to taste like hot chocolate- Nope! :/ still drinking it though
I'll be dropping by your pad sans kid today to drop off your present. Yay, I love playing Santa. :)
and the '6 year veteran' here is the one who was hit the hardest. Wonder how she'll take it...
um.. 20 percent less this year for the folks... Not sure what mine is... :/ I would never have expected that...
lol shoot I do that too! The tacos for the tastebuds, the diet coke for the conscious. Heheh
how do I make it not die? :/
you know what this means,.... shopping for dresses, skirts, accessories, etc. and I'm actually excited about it.
Oh yeah, back to work. LOL I can't concentrate today. Signing off Twitter for a bit. Maybe that'll help...
Ordered the free kit from EDM.Realized I'm a almost shade darker now. Jergens Natural Glow Face moisturizer really works, and works well!
Preparing annual performance reviews.
Have any of you ever had to 'break up' with a friend? Sometimes, the 'friendship' can take more work than what it's worth. I give her 1 wk.
L'oreal mascaras disappoints. Waiting for Major major lash to come to the rescue. Ordered it a couple days ago.
I'm so annoyed that hubby is sick. He complains like a baby but won't take medicine, or stay in bed, or stop smoking."Don't complain then!"
I'm bored home alone. Yep.
Drinking wine... And baking cookies.
Buying life insurance for my kid.
the tech says, "Enjoy your day!" LOVE IT. ;)
Boss talked me into buying 2 lottery tickets... I don't even know how much it's for... 170 something million..
... you know?? ;)
Holy balls!I fixed the scanner AND the email.Crazy how much you don't know of what you actually DO know until you have to use what you know
Teaching my kid how to pop bubble wrap, with his tiny little fingers. :) he has the biggest chipmunk-cheeks smile right now. :) me too.
As much as I love Hubs, I'm convinced he's half sloth. Half samoan, half sloth.
Home sweet home. Eating a slice of turkey in between 2 pieces of bread.
He's just spewing out all these suggestions. I can't decide if he's idealistic or just naive...
Such a headache... but so worth it. I'm making progress...
Retraining employee... and I think I'm finally getting through to him...
I threw my clothes in the dryer before getting dressed... :D all warm and toasty now with my cuppa' theraflu :)
15 more minutes... mmm... 15 more (hits SNOOZE) min...ute....ssss... Zzzz..zz...
I wish I could stay in bed, under these fluffy warm blankets all day. The air is so crispy cold. And the wood floors feel... brrr...
ughh... My sinuses feel all shriveled n dried out... wth knocked me out last night?... And when the hell did I paint my nails blue/green??
Rofl lmao!!!!!!
Back home, armed with boxes of theraflu, zicam, and airborne. I cannot afford to get sick.
The Accidental Smokey Eye, (see avatar)
http://twitpic.com/rt8p - Driving in the cold, Inkeddreams style
Tweeting for @Inkeddreams "5.0, .... 5.0!!"
Watching Shooter. :) love that mark wahlberg.
Damn socks...
#1 item on my Xmas Wish List- some damn socks. White thick ones, stocking-ish ones for work heels, ANY! Did laundry and can't find 1 PAIR!
http://twitpic.com/t8xw - ... my way... Hee hee
http://twitpic.com/t8xl - Teaching my kid how to eat oranges lol
invoices, stats, crunching numbers, bleh
trying something new this week: a different perspective.
Watching the Evan Baxter newscast scene in Bruce Almighty. Lmao "...doooo caca poo poo...."
Found my beautiful leather journal Hubs got me a couple yrs ago. Re-read all 9 entries.Amazed at how some things changed and others didn't.
Brewing green tea for tomorrow and straightening my hair... *Sigh* it takes forever...
http://twitpic.com/t05m - Totally loving this weird purplish color
Time for hot, steamy shower to clear sinuses and relax muscles. I'm totally, and surprisingly, loving Black Amethyst set from BathNBodyWorks
http://twitpic.com/sxw7 - Do not buy this kind- ever, ever, ever!
Okay, so its really nothing special: canned clams, with 8 oz cream cheese(warmed up so it soft), some salt, some pepper- voila! Ppl love it.
Ahh potatos boiling, cookies in the oven, next is clam dip.
I bought hubs the dvd set Generation Kill...And I should've known that it would be the only thing playing on our tv for the next four months
Last night, I bought Mr Bossman a SmithnWesson Survival knife... It's such a beauty. Will see if HE likes it today. :)
Ok, now I am actually awake. I have to re-do those batch of cookies (hee hee) and start on the homemade baked cheesy mashed potaters
Have no idea y I'm up so early....
Baking. ;)))
http://twitpic.com/vs3j - It was the only bow I had left... Heehee
Baking cookies for tomorrow w/ my new toy. :)
holy shit holy shit... I just prepared everyone's bonus check.... I'm in shock...
What does it mean when you get that blue screen of death on your computer? What's happening to it?
I really hope I get everything I ordered from beautycrunch. Haven't gotten the shipping email yet. *nervous*
26 yrs and he still doesn't even know how to spell my name correctly.
Just received email from my father. He signs it not Dad, but "David." :/ whatever...
